data.title: Department of the Air Force Inspector General > File an IG Complaint
data.text:
You are not required to identify yourself when submitting a DAF IG Hotline complaint. In addition to filing anonymously (where you do not give your name to the DAF IG Hotline), you may choose to provide your name and request confidentiality.

CONSENT TO DISCLOSURE:

DAF IG personnel will not disclose the identity of an IG source to individuals outside the DAF IG unless one of the following conditions below is met:

a. The complainant or witness consents to disclosure outside of the DAF IG and disclosure is made pursuant to the DAF IG personnelâ€™s duties.

b. The DAF IG determines the disclosure is unavoidable during the course of the investigation.

ANONYMOUS FILING STATUS:

If you file your complaint anonymously, we will not know who you are, and we will not be able to contact you to request additional information.
